Detailed Description

Defines a directory entry.

Each entry gives the name of the file, and where the file's header is to be found on disk. Internal data structures kept public so that Directory operations can access them directly.

Member Data Documentation

Is this directory entry in use?

char DirectoryEntry::name[FILENAMEMAXLEN+1]
 

Text name for file, with +1 for the trailing ''

int DirectoryEntry::sector
 

Location on disk to find the FileHeader for this file
